news.title: Hill Station Environmental Protection Measures
news.content: Himachal Pradesh High Court has issued strict guidelines for environmental protection in hill stations, regulating construction activities and promoting sustainable tourism practices.

news.title: Hydroelectric Projects Environmental Impact Assessment
news.content: The court mandates comprehensive environmental impact assessments for all hydroelectric projects in Himachal Pradesh, ensuring minimal ecological disruption and community consultation.

news.title: Apple Farmers Rights and Market Access
news.content: Himachal Pradesh High Court directs government to ensure fair market access and pricing for apple farmers, addressing issues of middleman exploitation and storage facilities.
